subject: Suits and Litigation
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: West Virginia said it had settled a lawsuit with the Big East for an unspecified amount, clearing the way for the university to join the Big 12 in July in time for football season.
snippet: West Virginia said it had settled a lawsuit with the Big East for an unspecified amount, clearing the way for the university to join the Big 12 in July in time for football season.
